Sent: Tuesday, July 18, 2006 3:24 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] misleading shell exit status when a single test class name
is supplied, and is not found ( '0 tests' case )



If junit4 is asked to run a single test but cannot find the test class,

It will exit with a shell success status instead of the expected shell
failure status:

(yes, it's a fairly trivial boundary case)

java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore apitest.ApiTesV1Ticket

JUnit version 4.1

Could not find class: apitest.ApiTesV1Ticket

Time: 0.001

OK (0 tests)

vmsvr1>echo $?

0
